tba

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • tba.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    The navigation class controls how the robot will maneuver about the grid. The robot navigates along the x and y axes only, thus at no angles other than 0 degrees, 90 degrees, 180 degrees and 270 degrees.
